title: Identify Key Components
text: Consider the essential tools and practices that protect a network from unauthorized access and threats.

title: Firewall Functionality
text: A firewall acts as a barrier between a trusted network and untrusted networks, controlling incoming and outgoing traffic based on security rules.

title: Intrusion Detection Systems
text: Intrusion detection systems monitor network traffic for suspicious activity and potential threats, alerting administrators to possible breaches.

title: Importance of Regular Updates
text: Regular updates ensure that security vulnerabilities are patched, reducing the risk of exploitation by attackers.
